title: Grade 5: District-wise minimum cut off marks released
body_lines: The Examinations Department has released the cut-off marks for the 2021 (2022) grade five scholarship examination to select students for schools and to award scholarships.
Accordingly, the department has released the minimum districtwise cutoff marks for those who sat for the examination in Sinhala and Tamil media. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
